Configuration.Title: SharePoint Portal Server Site
Configuration.Description: This template is obsolete.

Configuration.Title: SharePoint Portal Server Personal Space
Configuration.Description: This web template defines a Personal Space for an individual participating on a SharePoint Portal.

Configuration.Title: Personalization Site
Configuration.Description: A site for delivering personalized views, data, and navigation from this site collection into My Site. It includes personalization specific Web Parts and navigation that is optimized for My Site sites.

Configuration.Title: Contents area Template
Configuration.Description: This template is obsolete.

Configuration.Title: Topic area template
Configuration.Description: This template is obsolete.

Configuration.Title: News Site
Configuration.Description: This template is obsolete.

Configuration.Title: Publishing Site
Configuration.Description: A blank site for expanding your Web site and quickly publishing Web pages. Contributors can work on draft versions of pages and publish them to make them visible to readers. The site includes document and image libraries for storing Web publishing assets.

Configuration.Title: Publishing Site
Configuration.Description: This template creates a site for publishing Web pages on a schedule, with workflow features enabled. By default, only Publishing subsites can be created under this site. A Document and Picture Library are included for storing Web publishing assets.

Configuration.Title: Press Releases Site
Configuration.Description: This template creates the Press Releases subsite for an Internet-facing corporate presence website.

Configuration.Title: Publishing Site with Workflow
Configuration.Description: A site for publishing Web pages on a schedule by using approval workflows. It includes document and image libraries for storing Web publishing assets. By default, only sites with this template can be created under this site.

Configuration.Title: News Site
Configuration.Description: A site for publishing news articles and links to news articles. It includes a sample news page and an archive for storing older news items.

Configuration.Title: Site Directory
Configuration.Description: A site for listing and categorizing important sites in your organization. It includes different views for categorized sites, top sites, and a site map.

Configuration.Title: Community area template
Configuration.Description: This template is obsolete.

Configuration.Title: Report Center
Configuration.Description: A site for creating, managing, and delivering Web pages, dashboards, and key performance indicators that communicate metrics, goals, and business intelligence information.

Configuration.Title: Collaboration Portal
Configuration.Description: A starter site hierarchy for an intranet divisional portal. It includes a home page, a News site, a Site Directory, a Document Center, and a Search Center with Tabs. Typically, this site has nearly as many contributors as readers and is used to host team sites.

Configuration.Title: Enterprise Search Center
Configuration.Description: A site for delivering the search experience. The welcome page includes a search box with two tabs: one for general searches, and another for searches for information about people. You can add and customize tabs to focus on other search scopes or result types.

Configuration.Title: Profiles
Configuration.Description: This template creates a profile site that includes page layout with zones

Configuration.Title: Publishing Portal
Configuration.Description: A starter site hierarchy for an Internet-facing site or a large intranet portal. This site can be customized easily with distinctive branding. It includes a home page, a sample press releases subsite, a Search Center, and a login page. Typically, this site has many more readers than contributors, and it is used to publish Web pages with approval workflows.

Configuration.Title: My Site Host
Configuration.Description: A site used for hosting personal sites (My Sites) and the public People Profile page. This template needs to be provisioned only once per User Profile Service Application, please consult the documentation for details.

Configuration.Title: Enterprise Wiki
Configuration.Description: A site for publishing knowledge that you capture and want to share across the enterprise. It provides an easy content editing experience in a single location for co-authoring content, discussions, and project management.
